attributes.action: Give Mr Bruce Forsyth a Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been entertained by Bruce Forsyth for 50yrs and myself and everyone I know is mystified by the fact that dozens of inferior musicians and "entertainers" have received knighthoods over the last 15/20 yrs whilst this family entertainer who is still bringing joy and laughter to millions has been overlooked.  Do you think that this could be remedied in this New Year`s Honours List.  I`m sure that it woulod be a popular move on behalf of the Prime Minister.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give Mr Bruce Forsyth a Knighthood."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17311


Prime Minister's Office
